exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneASkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="sceneA_jpg"/>
	<e:Image id="phoneBtn" source="sceneA_phone_png" x="324" y="846" anchorOffsetX="81" anchorOffsetY="87.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneBSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneB_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="00:12" y="145" size="40" width="150" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="245"/>
	<e:Rect id="phoneBtn" height="158" width="164" x="245" y="866" fillAlpha="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneCSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneC_jpg" y="-10" x="0" height="1054"/>
	<e:Image id="title" source="sceneC_title_png" x="112" y="200"/>
	<e:Group id="starGroup" height="1040" width="640" x="-30">
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" x="5" y="45"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="255" x="15"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="175" x="215"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star2_png" x="445" y="51"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="phoneBtn" source="sceneC_phone_png" y="741" anchorOffsetX="88" anchorOffsetY="90.5" x="312"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneDSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneC_jpg" height="1080" y="-10"/>
	<e:Group id="starGroup" height="1040" width="640">
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" x="5" y="45"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="55" x="15"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="255" x="15"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="175" x="215"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="title" source="sceneD_title_png" y="105" x="83"/>
	<e:Image id="star0" source="sceneC_star_png" y="15" x="365" anchorOffsetX="182"/>
	<e:Image id="star1" source="sceneC_star2_png" x="285" y="51"/>
	<e:Group id="imgGroup" height="1040" width="640">
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img0_png" x="231" y="431" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img1_png" x="434" y="431" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img2_png" x="231" y="631" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img3_png" x="434" y="631" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img4_jpg" x="238" y="839" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneD_img5_jpg" x="443" y="839" anchorOffsetX="96.2" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="arrow" source="comm_arrow_png" y="953" x="303"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneESkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneE_jpg" y="-9" height="1050" x="0"/>
	<e:Group width="640" height="1040" id="starGroup">
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="45" x="5"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star2_png" y="51" x="445"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="title" source="sceneE_title_png" y="100" x="145"/>
	<e:Image id="phoneBtn" source="sceneE_phone_png" y="821" x="317" anchorOffsetX="78" anchorOffsetY="75.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneFSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneF_jpg" y="-8" x="0" height="1054"/>
	<e:Group width="640" height="1040" id="starGroup">
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="45" x="5"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star2_png" y="51" x="445"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="title" source="sceneF_title_png" y="353" x="126"/>
	<e:Image source="comm_arrow_png" id="arrow" x="303" y="988"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneGSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="sceneF_jpg" y="-9" height="1054"/>
	<e:Group width="640" height="1040" id="starGroup">
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star_png" y="45" x="5"/>
		<e:Image source="sceneC_star2_png" y="51" x="445"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="title" source="sceneG_title_png" y="121" x="104"/>
	<e:Image id="submitBg" source="sceneG_submitBg_png" y="289" width="452" height="268" x="94"/>
	<e:Image id="submitBtn" source="sceneG_submit_png" y="574" x="317" anchorOffsetX="73" anchorOffsetY="35"/>
	<e:Image id="tree" source="sceneG_tree_png" x="111" bottom="-15"/>
	<e:EditableText width="180" height="25" x="278" y="389" size="22" textColor="0xFEFAFA"/>
	<e:EditableText y="436" height="25" width="180" size="22" x="278" textColor="0xFCFAFA"/>
	<e:EditableText y="486" size="20" width="180" height="25" x="279" textColor="0xF9F4F4"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ScrollSceneSkin" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<ns1:ItemScroller id="scroll" width="640" height="1040">
		<e:Group id="sceneGroup" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
			<ns1:SceneD skinName="SceneDSkin"/>
			<ns1:SceneE skinName="SceneESkin" y="1040"/>
			<ns1:SceneF x="-179" y="526" skinName="SceneFSkin"/>
			<ns1:SceneG x="-114" y="508" skinName="SceneGSkin"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="0"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</ns1:ItemScroller>
</e:Skin>
